name: Chronobender
description:
Chronobender

The time travel experiment gone wrong and there is very dangerous thing all around. Can you change something in the past to live in better future?

  • 3D
  • First Person
  • Puzzle Time Travel
  • Escape Room 

Authors:
Martin Stanček 
Peter Rodziňák
Dárius Černý
Martina Lacková
David Raček
